name: Eldritch Cuisine
description:
Eldritch Cuisine: A mix-up of Horror & Cooking. Created during Ludum Dare 41 by a 6-man team in 72 hours.

Feed the customers as they enter your restaurant, but do it quickly! The customers aren't known for patience, and might come looking for another snack...

New customers will ring the bell and expect you to take their order from their booths. Find the cooking instructions on the wall, and the ingredients in the pantry. Bring the finished meal back to the customer and they stay happy!

Controls: WASD for movement, left & right click for using left & right hand.

Team: Eelis Aaltonen, Vertti Viitanen, Nikke Vartia, Michael Dawkins, Minna Eriksson, Eeva Halmila
